content.B010: The desktop version of <sple/> is built using <linkWails>Wails</linkWails>. It uses the same source code as the web app <linkSpleMe/> to render frontend, but with some different backend bindings to work with its host binary in desktop environment.
content.B020: Compared to , DOES work with regular files on your device, like any other desktop editors do.

confirm.CloseFileSave: File {filename} has been changed. Save the changes?
confirm.CloseOthersSave: The files you are closing have been changed. Save the changes?
confirm.ExitSave: Some of the files have been changed. Save the changes before exiting?
